name: Rump
description:
In Rump You Play As A Frog Who is Trying to Survive The Falling Items from the sky.     But When you Jump A random Event Happens like Change in player speed or change in cam rotation so Jump can be Bad Some times or good

This is For A GameJam and it only touches the theme a little bit. I didn't have any other ideas and i was running out of time so might be bad. I'm just starting out but I'm really proud of what i have created 

Also Only 5% of Art Was Made by Me

And The 95% Was Download from https://pixelfrog-assets.itch.io/pixel-adventure-1

The Audio Was Made By Me In LMMS and SFX
